name: Jammy Road - Penguin and Bird Best Friends! - Fun Game for Free
name_original: Jammy Road - Penguin and Bird Best Friends! - Fun Game for Free
description:
Hey! It's Penguin here! Come and help please! Too many cars out there!

Take part in a very heavy job, help Penguin manage the traffic!

Cars and birds Everywhere! You have to be very fast and quick, if you don't want to crash the cars!

At the same time you should take care of your score on the international leaderboard.

It is not hard to be the first, but to keep the first place will be a lot harder!

***************************************************************

* Let's see whats going on now:

***************************************************************

* Four highway lanes

* A Lot of cars, kinda fast cars

* Test your fortune, spin the prizewheel!

* Amazing graphics, pictures are not edited above

* International race in score

* Impressive in-game animations

* Fully free, not freemium!

_____________________________________________

So what's now? Let's try it out! Guaranteed fun!

And it is even fully FREE!

_____________________________________________
